website_summaries.verdict: Simple, stylish cheese knife set that comes with only the essentials.
pros: 4-piece knife set comes with a cheese fork, shovel, and 2 knives with stylish bamboo handles

customer_reviews.title: I love these cheese knives so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these cheese knives so much! They're an excellent value and look much more expensive than $10!! I bought them for a work function where I brought cheese and crackers and I got a number of compliments and asks of where I got them. They are easy to clean and lightweight so easy to store. They seem very sturdy and good quality. Hoping they last through many a dinner party! 100% recommend as they're an inexpensive way to class up a cheese board. Who doesn't love looking fancy and adult??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I needed these but didn’t want to spend a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Meidiheidi

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Lovely and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a housewarming gift for a friend. She served cheese while I was there so I got to test them out. They sliced the cheeses very well. They also looked quite nice in person. I was pleased with how nice they are, I am buying a set for myself. I think one thing that is great about these is that when I serve cheese, I slice it before guests arrive, but these make it so I do not need to take the time to do this before - guests can slice their own cheese as they eat.
customer_reviews.author: NYrat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cheese knife set
customer_reviews.text: This cheese knife set is very nice. The blades are sharp, and the rounded handles are nice looking and easy to hold on to. It's nice having three different knives. One for each cheese, and also the fork. The wood grain matched nicely with the chessboard.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amp up your charcuterie!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a bridal shower I was hosting, and everyone commented on how cute they were! They’re a must-have if you plan on making a charcuterie board or cheese spread. I’m even buying another set for the bride as a gift because she liked them so much :)
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: handle is very cheap
customer_reviews.text: They're great little cheese knives but when I pulled them out of the box the handle felt extremely cheap. It's a very light handle - I just expected them to be a little more dense.
customer_reviews.author: Cyanna

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cheese knife set for the price! Looks nice and the blades are fairly sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Overall they are fine, perhaps not as sturdy as some other sets ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift. Overall they are fine, perhaps not as sturdy as some other sets that I've seen, but given the price they seem reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bourbeau

customer_reviews.title: Nice for gifting as long as you repackage
customer_reviews.text: Paired these with a custom cutting board as a gift - very well received. Had to re=pack these into a jewelry box for presentation, as the box they come in is very plain and cheap looking. Product itself looks very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Malory K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality product, I like it very much. I would not put these in the dish washer though, to prevent the wooden handle from wearing out too quick. Wash by hand and they will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: and nice quality. The wood isn't meant for the dishwasher ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, and nice quality. The wood isn't meant for the dishwasher so hand wash them!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and they seemed great however; they are junk! They are flimsy and probably will break the first time they are used. I had planned on giving these as a gift but I’m too embarrassed to give them out as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis J.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: As a gift I thought that it was a perfect ideA
customer_reviews.author: STACY SALMOND

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but a little smaller than we expected
customer_reviews.text: It is always hard to tell when buying stuff online, but these are smaller than we expected. They seem to be okay quality and do what we want, so we can't ding them too much on size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Everton

customer_reviews.title: Great items for price
customer_reviews.text: Great items for price, sturdy and holding up well. Recommend oiling wood ends to keep from drying out from any washing detergent detergent used on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: So cute and will be used for many years to come.  I highly recommend this cute set of cheese tools.
customer_reviews.text: These are so well made and elegant...will go with any serving pieces and fit any occasion...!!! I am very happy with my purchase...!!!
customer_reviews.author: WandaLovesMakeup

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value
customer_reviews.text: For under $10 you can’t go wrong. They’re pretty durable, good handles, and the blades aren’t flimsy. Perfect for any cheese platter
customer_reviews.author: Spencer S

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a wedding present with a customized cutting board. They went perfectly with the board and are very cute. I don't know if they're durable, because I've never used them personally, but they seemed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great set but the handles dry out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I like these I like that there's a variety of different ones to use with different cheeses. What I don't like is the handles dry out so easily, hand wash only in lukewarm water.
customer_reviews.author: Evita

customer_reviews.title: Pieces fine. Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are nice, but comes in a cheap display box embarrassing to give as gift. Found better sets for half as much as Marshall’s
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wastak

customer_reviews.title: I waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for a gift,but will not be giving them. The're tiny, looks like something my Grandaughter would play with her toy dishes. My issue is that no where in the discription does it mention their size. They should be discribed as mini cheese cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.text: Tiny but serves the purpose. Nice set for the quality and value! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: “The Critic”

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Set for a nice price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for a nice price. Will work great for our small cheese board.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: i return them because I purchase the same ones but with the cutting board for almost the same price !!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vivona

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than most cheese serving pieces. The bamboo handles look nice but the Quality and constitution of the knife is poor seems unstable and wobbly I feel the handle will separate from the knife after a few uses .
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Item did not arrive with my other bought items..
customer_reviews.text: In my whole shipment this was the only item I didn’t receive. Which i needed for my spouse surprised anniversary dinner this weekend.. Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: They were a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and they love the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive cheese knives that work well
customer_reviews.text: I got these knives as a little gift for my sister, who is always throwing parties with various hors d’oeuvres. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: John Arena

customer_reviews.title: but I was quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered as a gift to be included with a monogrammed cheese board. They matched perfectly. They were a little smaller than expected, but I was quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jjames

customer_reviews.title: Nice product...package crap!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for gift...Nice product the box was crappy, so cant gift in it....will have to wrap in something else!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Haven't use them yet, but can't wait. They look smashing!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Gilmer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cheese knife set specifically because I loved the look of the pronged knife and serving fork and to my surprise I got something completely different. Tomorrow is Christmas Eve and know have no idea what to do. It was a gift along with a beautiful cutting board. Thank you for ruining the gift for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Magnani

customer_reviews.title: Do what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I mean they are cheese knives, they cut cheese and they're aesthetically pleasing. Wish there was another knife instead of the one with the tines, that one is kinda useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Looks much more expensive then what I paid for it
customer_reviews.text: Great item, looks very sturdy and expensive, but was much cheaper then what I have seen in stores. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Well made, sharp, and beautiful. Price was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good cheese knives
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because I was tired of using butter knives on my cute charcuterie boards. haha. They work well and look nice. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: drw920

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. They are cute, perfect size. Quick arrival with Prime. Each wrapped in their own plastic bag. I do hand wash and dry these. Not sure I trust the dishwashers high heat on the bamboo. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Wood finishing is not as nice as it appears in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Color sanding and staining is cheeper than appears in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: disgusting
customer_reviews.text: disgusting. I washed them before using and now the water spots WONT go away.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Clutter

customer_reviews.title: hell yeah!
customer_reviews.text: These are the bomb.com! They look fancy as hell when I host friends with cheese, and they're pretty darn sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Plaptor

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: A little cheapy, but it’s very inexpensive. Honestly, I was surprised at the quality for such a cheap price. Decent set. For as often as I’ll need cheese knives, (once or twice a year for a party?), these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect when I make charcuterie boards for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The four pieces are just very practice and helpful if you have any visit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: this is such a pretty set and such good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Used these at Christmas on my cheeseboard and was very happy that they were sharp enough to cut through some of the harder cheeses.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These knives are very easy to hold and cut with, and they are quite simple and elegant. They don't arrive too sharp, so you may want to sharpen them up with a standard knife sharpener if you are cutting harder cheeses. I haven't had them for too long, but they seem pretty durable and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory to my party spread!
customer_reviews.text: These cheese knives were great quality. The handles are beautiful and the blades sharp.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive.. Knives are good showpiece, but doesn't do its job well
customer_reviews.text: the knives didn't do the job at all.. I had to use a regular knife to cut the cheese.. very much disappointed
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and they do a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I received and used them and they work great! They are cute and they do the job so I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AR0928

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these as Christmas gifts. These are sturdy, durable and very nice looking for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Not color in picture
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nice overall but did not match the wood shown in picture. I got it to match a cutting board and the color was a light wood on all 4 pieces. The picture showed 4 different colors (which would have matched my cutting board) so it did not match the cutting board at all and it was for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Not satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks terrible. Nothing like in the picture. Poor quality, the color is not the same and the metal looks like it would detach from the handle any moment. The color of the wood (whatever it is) does not match the bamboo color. I bought it as an addition to a cheese set, that i have lost some of the tools. It looked exactly the same in the picture, in reality not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Ivona

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy about this AT ALL, and to return it back have to pay out of my pocket
customer_reviews.author: Enik

customer_reviews.title: The good news is that these cheese knives are sharp and ...
customer_reviews.text: The good news is that these cheese knives are sharp and the ad news is that these knives are sharp. You have to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Very good set for the price. A nice place to start if you are wanting to get into cheese boards
customer_reviews.author: Makena

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: It was for a nice gift. Well received and I felt good giving it!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, so I hope they are working well. They are very nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! Work as well as the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Work as well as the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: churchgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet but they are exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene   Cleghorn

customer_reviews.title: Lacks quality
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of China and appear to be a cheap gift! Packaging is awful- thin cardboard bent up. Wood on handles just ok. For the price, not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lorene Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product but bad sticker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. The knives are great but there is a "Made in China" sticker across the front of the box. Can't use the box. Big bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are adorable and work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These utensils are good quality and just the right size for appetizer servings
customer_reviews.author: CORINA CHAVEZ

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a darker color one but it turns out it is a light color
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, and good quality for the price, we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela DeLaMare

customer_reviews.title: Not giftable
customer_reviews.text: One of the knives was completely unusable due to poor quality. Handle was flimsy and broken. I'll use the other three, but still disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: look nice - believe they will hold up to many wine ...
customer_reviews.text: thrilled with this set - actually bought 4 sets to give as gifts - work well, look nice - believe they will hold up to many wine and cheese parties!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very sharp, cute! The only thing I didn't like is that it comes in a plastic bag and I was planning on offering it didn't look good in the plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but the handle on 2 of them seem ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to match my bamboo serving platters. Nice looking but the handle on 2 of them seem loose.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Missing a knife from the set
customer_reviews.text: Set was nice but it came missing the 2 prong cheese knife
customer_reviews.author: Ly Tieu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a gift along with a cheese board, very nice quality
customer_reviews.author: RLL

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cheese knives looked great with my wooden cheese platter.
customer_reviews.author: isme

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little thin but perfect addition to a pantry. Show's well at picnics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for a gift and I felt they ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift and I felt they were a little cheap looking especially not even coming in a box, a cheap plastic bag. The handles had some discoloration and marks in the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha S.

customer_reviews.title: These cheese knives are sturdy, well designed
customer_reviews.text: These cheese knives are sturdy, well designed, and comfortable in the hand. They work well for cutting, spreading, and spearing cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Where is my 4th cheese cutter?
customer_reviews.text: I only got three! I am missing the third cheese cutter in the picture. How do I get the other cutter?
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Cheese knives
customer_reviews.text: The knives seem to be of good quality, but was disappointed by the presentation which looked cheap packaged in a plastic ziploc bag. I was too embarrassed to give it as a gift the way it was packaged, so put it in a gift box.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene L.

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: These are a great little cheese knife set. The bamboo handles look and feel great and the blades have a nice highly polished finish.
customer_reviews.author: R. Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these imagining I'd use them for a few months until I could buy a nice set at a local store. Boy was I wrong. They are a bit small, but they are well-constructed with sturdy handles and wickedly sharp edges. I liked them enough to buy another set for a friend. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: CountryLane

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these would be a better quality than what I received. It appeared that they may have been used. knives have scratch marks. I will keep them because I do not have time to return and purchase something better. Good enough for a tailgate charcuterie board which is how I plan on using them but I would not want to use them for a nicer party.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.text: They are a waste of money. So lightweight. Junk. Landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Mossy

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable set!
customer_reviews.text: The color was a little lighter than anticipated but still is such a great set of cheese knifes. For the price, I was very pleased with the quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't match the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed that the wood color on these didn't match the ones I ordered. They were a part of a wedding gift with a cheese board I had custom made. Picked these because they matched... Then they didn't. Pretty disappointed but I still have it to them. :(
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this cheese knife set. Great quality! Got another as a gift and kept this one ;)
customer_reviews.author: biohazardkbd

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, buy these
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to hold, look expensive. You need them! My cheese board is expensive but these match perfectly and awesome price point.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these along with an engraved cutting board for a wedding gift. These together made a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: S. Penick

customer_reviews.title: I bought this set because they received good reviews. Although I have not used them yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because they received good reviews. Although I have not used them yet, I was impressed by their quality. They appear well made. The handles are sturdy. I just wish this same set was made in a bigger size. Will post again once I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Scully

customer_reviews.title: A bargain set
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice tools, sturdy, nice looking and would match any bamboo cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Nice little set.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. They seem well made for the price. I have only had the chance to use them once or twice so far, but overall, seem good. They do not look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, high quality
customer_reviews.text: A very handy cheese knifes set. Looks great, high quality. Pair it with a nice round wooden trey for a perfect wine and cheese table setting.
customer_reviews.author: M8

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese tools
customer_reviews.text: I use these a lot. I love how handy they are. They work great too.
customer_reviews.author: SandyRose

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little set, they just arrived today. They're study and very well made. The blades are clean and sharp and the handles are nice an smooth, not rough like some wood utensils. I can't wait to use them on my next buffet spread!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 packs of these for 2 charcuterie gifts. The packaging is terrible and cheap. I can't gift them in the current packaging so I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Love these cheese knives. Just the right size and they matched the cheese board I had bought separately. Great gift idea and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An inexpensive and utilitarian set of chees knives....with these 4 items chees cutting will never be a problem again.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold without hand slipping. Very sharp. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Tillie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set of knives, a little smaller than expected but nice and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: lelegrem

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set. Well made with good quality craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Well made with good quality craftsmanship. Not cheap-looking. Sharp edges. Perfect for your next wine and cheese party.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Inanoria

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and fit the Soho vibe
customer_reviews.text: I added this product to a fundraiser donation. Gift cert. to local cheese shop... Cheese board and these cheese cutters . Worked great and fit the Soho vibe.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Super cute set
customer_reviews.text: Super cute set. They are pretty small but work perfectly on a cheese board. I've already used them twice.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Mendez

product_meta.title: Freehawk 4 Pieces Set Cheese Knives with Bamboo Wood Handle Steel Stainless Cheese Slicer Cheese Cutter (Original Bamboo Handle)
feature_bullets: 4-Pieces Set Includes: Semi Heart Knife for Spreading Cheese, 2 Rectangular Shapes for Slicing and Spreading,1 Prong Fork for Serving.
Perfect serving ools for any occasion (party trays, dinner table, etc).
Stainless steel, long lasting cheese tools.
Easy to wash and are light weight and easy to store in your kitchen cabinet.
Great as a gift for the cheese lover.
